key.name: pool-capacity
key.description: Capacity of pellet pool which pre-creates and stores pellets. No extra creation of pellet. ( If all of pellets in pool are on screen, no spawning pellet before some pellet get out and be availiable to use. ) Change on this key will take effect after restart.

key.name: spawn-timeout
key.description: Spawning timeout. (or interval) On every timeout, a pellet is spawned in spawn-probability

key.name: spawn-probability
key.description: Spawning probability where spawning is actually done. 0 never spawn any pellets, 1 spawns a pellet every timeout.

key.name: proceed-timeout
key.description: Timeout ( or interval ) of animating pellets. lower value would yields smoother animation but uses more cpu time.

key.name: pellet-colors
key.description: Color of pellets. You can put one or more colors you like to see. Fill this setting in format which Gdk.RGBA.parse() would understand. For example, rgba(int, int, int, 0 ~ 1 ). Change on this key will take effect after restart.

key.name: pellet-default-alpha
key.description: This value is applied to pellets whose alpha wasn't specified yet.

key.name: pellet-trail-length
key.description: Change on this key will take effect after restart.

key.name: pellet-width
key.description: Change on this key will take effect after restart.

key.name: pellet-glow-radius
key.description: Change on this key will take effect after restart.

key.name: pellet-offset-x
key.description: Change on this key will take effect after restart.

key.name: pellet-offset-y
key.description: Change on this key will take effect after restart.
